column5: I feel you. :( Try seeing a therapist. That’s what I am currently doing and I’m getting better. Not 100%, but still better.

We’ve all been there, I think (or maybe it’s also coz I always felt that way and thought that’s what people normally feel?) 
Anyway, you are not alone and I think some way somehow we will find something we truly enjoy doing—something that will make us feel, well, ALIVE.
